tool.name: barcode_collapse
tool.description: Paired End randomer aware duplicate removal algorithm !

param.name: input_file
param.label: Unsorted bam file to barcode collapse

tool.help: Read in a .bam file where the first 9 nucleotides of the read name are the barcode and merge reads mapped to the same position that have the same barcode. Assumes paired end reads are adjacent to each other in the output file (i.e only provide unsorted bams). Also assumes that there are no multimappers in the bam file, if there are multimappers behavior is undefined.
